short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes the Digital Ocean menus less confusing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I manage more than 100 DO droplets across several accounts and 1 team and their navigation always confused me.

This simple Chrome extension makes the Digital Ocean account menus less confusing:

* Moves Settings and Notifications to the top menu where they belong
* Renames Settings > Notifications to Settings > E-mail subscriptions which is where it actually takes you

Source code: https://github.com/addpipe/Less-Confusing-Digital-Ocean-Menus
